page.title: 09Recreation.Recreation Field.
page.content: In Newport there is a large grass recreation field.It is used for many sporting events and is really the focal point for sporting activity in the village.In the winter time,the field is marked out for football and the village team plays regularly in an adult football league.The school also uses the football pitch to entertain visiting schools for friendly matches. In the summer,joggers,golfers and the school, use the field constantly.This summer of 1985,has seen the emergence of a newly formed cricket club.Turf has been laid for a good wicket and a large roller,left in the recreation field from previous years, when cricket was more popular,has been brought back into use to roll the pitch.It is a beautiful field and although many people enjoy sport there many more just enjoy walking on it.
